mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Because your wealth deserves the royal treatment!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-it was brunch at the fanciest spot in town, and I stroll in wearing my designer shades and sipping on a $100 latte. The hostess had the nerve to tell me there was a wait! Can you believe it? I took one look around at the peasants waiting in line and demanded to see the manager. As I explained that my time is more valuable than everyone else's combined, they miraculously found me a table fit for a king. It may have taken a scene, but hey, when you're as important as I am, you have to stand up for yourself.
